summary.body: Can any anyone recommend a good cabinet-maker. We want to put some shelves and drawers in the built-in bedroom cupboards and also a bit of minor work in the kitchen. Any recommendations much appreciated
summary.subject: Carpenter/cabinet maker

summary.body: Can anyone recommend a good carpenter/joiner/cabinet maker to put in some fitted cupboards & wardrobes?
summary.subject: Furniture makers

summary.body: Because they're both so good, they're both incredibly busy. Does anyone know of another carpenter/handyman that knows the Barbican? Many thanks
summary.subject: Carpenter that isn't Billy or Michael recommendation?

summary.body: I have just bought a flat in Crescent House, Golden Lane Estate, I want to renovate the bathroom and kitchen and the original kitchen/dining room partition does antbody have any good contacts?
summary.subject: Renovators, carpenteters, plumbers, electricians, anyone!
